article_title: Is the country heading in the right direction?
article_text:
President Obama delivers his State of the Union address before the U.S. Congress tonight. He is expected to focus on the state of the economy and its impact on the middle class.

The speech will begin at 8:00 p.m. MPR News will have live coverage.

How would you assess the state of the union in one sentence?

Today’s Question: Is the country heading in the right direction?
